SYN_PT_1_5: We did a bronchoscopy today for the lung nodules used general anesthesia put in a tube. Looked around airway was clear. Used the navigation system to get to the RLL nodule radial probe showed we were right in it concentric view. Did needle biopsy forceps and the brush thing. Pathologist said it was cancer right there in the room. No bleeding patient did fine extubated sent to recovery.
